title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: NoneCourse ContentsIntroduction: Interrelationship between Industrialization, Transfer of Technology and Economic Development; Some Basic Concepts and Analytical Tools of Development Economics; Characteristics of Underdevelopment; Problems and Pattern of Industrialization in Developing Economy; Socio-Economic Dualism; Structural and Organizational Change in the Process of Economic Development; Industrialization and Urbanization; Growth of Entrepreneurship; Industrial Policy and Planning in India with Particular Emphasis on Foreign Capital and Technology Transfer; Optimum Resource Use in the Context of Changing Technology; Levels of Technology; Technology Gap; Intra-National and International Transfer of Technology; Need for Adaptation and Development of Appropriate Technology; Multinational Corporations and Transfer of Technology; Situation in India: Import of Technology to India; Country-Wise Experience; Transfer of Technology between the Developing Countries, Development of Human Resources and Technology Transfer, Import Substitution and Development of Indigenous Technology.
